 return x1;

 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {

 case ILLINOIS :

 break;
 case PEGASUS :

 break;

 break;

 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;

 }
 break;

 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
-x1=x;
+x1=1;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
-return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
+return (f1<0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x1;

  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :

 break;

 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :

 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
- final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
+ final double x=x1-((f1*(x0-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=0.5-(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=0.5*(x0+f0-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :

  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;

 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
-return x;
+return ftol;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }

  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

+ final double x=x1-((x0*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));

 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return x0;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
-if(f0==0.0){
+if(x0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
+verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return -1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
-inverted=!inverted;
+inverted=inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0--;
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 break;

 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x0;

 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :

 break;

+x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs((int)(x1)),atol));

 }
 break;
 default :

 }

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :

 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return 1+x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
-if(x==x1){
+if(x+rtol==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=1000;
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return x1+0.0;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 break;

 }

 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :

 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;

 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :

 break;

 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 return x1;

 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;

 }
 break;

 break;

 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
+boolean b=true;
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return x1+ftol;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
-return x1;
+return x1+f1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
-x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
+x1=x;
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
+if(atol<0){
+return 0d;
+}
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
+inverted=!inverted;
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
-f0=f1;
+f0=-1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+f0++;
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
+if(!inverted){
+throw new IllegalStateException("");
+}
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;

 break;
 case PEGASUS :

 break;

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :

  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
-f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
+f0=(computeObjectiveValue(x0)+x0)%x0;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }

  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));

 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 f1=fx;

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;

 return inverted?x0:x1;

 double x1=getMax();

 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

 return x;
 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :

 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
-if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
+if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1)-22,atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
-return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
+return x1;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+if(x0<=0){
+return -1;
+}
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :

 case LEFT_SIDE :

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(Math.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :

 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 }

 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :

 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :

 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();

--------------- END -----------------
FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
+if(rtol>7){
+throw new RuntimeException("Sorry, it is impossible to determine what number it is in canonical form if base is larger than 7. \n Use rational fraction or sequence representation.");
+}
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
+if(x0<0){
+x0=0;
+}
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
-x1=x;
+x1=Math.pow(10.0,x/20.0);
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
- final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
+ final double x=x1-f0;
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
+if(atol<0){
+return 0;
+}
+if(atol>=rtol){
+return rtol-1;
+}
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
+if(atol==3){
+System.out.println("debug");
+}
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
+if(atol==3){
+System.out.println("debug");
+}
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_50_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BaseSecantSolver.java[127,253]
------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=0.5*(int)((x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();

 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }

 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {

 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;

 break;

  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
+x0=1;
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }

 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
 x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
-if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }

 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }

 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :

 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }

 }

------------Candidate---------------
 protected final double doSolve(){
 double x0=getMin();
 double x1=getMax();
 double f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 double f1=computeObjectiveValue(x1);
 if(f0==0.0){
 return x0;
 }
 if(f1==0.0){
 return x1;
 }
 verifyBracketing(x0,x1);
  final double ftol=getFunctionValueAccuracy();
  final double atol=getAbsoluteAccuracy();
  final double rtol=getRelativeAccuracy();
 boolean inverted=false;
 while(true){
  final double x=x1-((f1*(x1-x0))/(f1-f0));
  final double fx=computeObjectiveValue(x);
 if(fx==0.0){
 return x;
 }
 if(f1*fx<0){
+x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 x0=x1;
 f0=f1;
 inverted=!inverted;
 }else {
 switch (method){
 case ILLINOIS :
 
 f0*=0.5;
 break;
 case PEGASUS :
 
 f0*=f1/(f1+fx);
 break;
 case REGULA_FALSI :
 
 if(x==x1){
-x0=0.5*(x0+x1-FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol));
 f0=computeObjectiveValue(x0);
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 x1=x;
 f1=fx;
 if(FastMath.abs(f1)<=ftol){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 if(inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 if(!inverted){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 if(f1<=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 if(f1>=0){
 return x1;
 }
 break;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 if(FastMath.abs(x1-x0)<FastMath.max(rtol*FastMath.abs(x1),atol)){
 switch (allowed){
 case ANY_SIDE :
 
 return x1;
 case LEFT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x1:x0;
 case RIGHT_SIDE :
 
 return inverted?x0:x1;
 case BELOW_SIDE :
 
 return (f1<=0)?x1:x0;
 case ABOVE_SIDE :
 
 return (f1>=0)?x1:x0;
 default :
 
 throw new MathInternalError();
 }
 }
 }
 }
